publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-3838 Bill Butler: Drumchapel Table Tennis Club, Champions of Britain—That the Parliament congratulates Drumchapel Table Tennis Club on winning the British League Premier Division title by defeating Ormesby 7-1 on Saturday 28 March 2009; thanks the club members who visited Holyrood prior to the recent Members’ Business debate celebrating the club’s achievements, and wishes the club continued success in the years ahead. Supported by: Ken Macintosh*, Jamie McGrigor*, Kenneth Gibson*, Robin Harper*, Johann Lamont*, Rob Gibson*, Paul Martin*, John Park*, Dr Richard Simpson*, Bob Doris*, Andy Kerr*, Patricia Ferguson*, Cathy Jamieson*, Elaine Murray*, Karen Whitefield*

S3M-3838 Drumchapel Table Tennis Club, Champions of Britain (lodged on 31 March 2009) Jackie Baillie*, Aileen Campbell*, Elaine Smith*, David Whitton*, Trish Godman*, Des McNulty*, Mary Mulligan*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Brian Adam*, Jamie Hepburn*, Jack McConnell*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Bill Aitken*
S3M-3838 Drumchapel Table Tennis Club, Champions of Britain (lodged on 31 March 2009) Anne McLaughlin*, Hugh Henry*, Cathie Craigie*, Marilyn Livingstone*, Bill Kidd*

S3M-3838 Bill Butler: Drumchapel Table Tennis Club, Champions of Britain—That the Parliament congratulates Drumchapel Table Tennis Club on winning the British League Premier Division title by defeating Ormesby 7-1 on Saturday 28 March 2009; thanks the club members who visited Holyrood prior to the recent Members’ Business debate celebrating the club’s achievements, and wishes the club continued success in the years ahead. Supported by: Ken Macintosh, Jamie McGrigor, Kenneth Gibson, Robin Harper, Johann Lamont, Rob Gibson, Paul Martin, John Park, Dr Richard Simpson, Bob Doris, Andy Kerr, Patricia Ferguson, Cathy Jamieson, Elaine Murray, Karen Whitefield, Jackie Baillie, Aileen Campbell, Elaine Smith, David Whitton, Trish Godman, Des McNulty, Mary Mulligan, Hugh O’Donnell, Brian Adam, Jamie Hepburn, Jack McConnell, Mr Frank McAveety, Bill Aitken, Anne McLaughlin, Hugh Henry, Cathie Craigie, Marilyn Livingstone, Bill Kidd
S3M-3838 Drumchapel Table Tennis Club, Champions of Britain (lodged on 31 March 2009) Lewis Macdonald*, Stuart McMillan*
